duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain facility cleanliness and perform building and equipment maintenance and repairs to company standards.
Perform machine installation, light fabrication projects, and office remodel/demolition projects.
Assist with essential and routine facility maintenance and repairs, as well as facility improvement projects.
Work with or assist contractors to complete projects or complex repairs.
Drive forklift and other facility vehicles, perform maintenance and upkeep on grounds and parking lots.
Be available for emergencies and weather-related events, and respond to facility needs during off-hours, if needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. 3-5 years of experience in facility maintenance and repair.
